strategy: Kabal of the Black Heart armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Dark Eldar Kabal, Tormentor, Torture Titans, and Executioner formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. Partisans receive a +1 modifier when attempting an engage action.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Kabal of the Bladed Lotus

sections.name: Kabal of the Black Heart Special

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Dark Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

formations.name: 0-1 Portable Webway Portal
formations.units: Add a portable Webway Portal to an Archon, Dracon, Succubus or Ancient character in the army. This portable Webway may be used once in a game. After the characters formation completes an action you may place a barrage template marker completely within 15cm of the character and outside any enemy zones of control. This marker counts as a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way. Remove this Webway Portal marker in the end phase of the turn before any rallying.

formations.name: Kabal Coterie
formations.units: Four Incubi and one Archon character
upgrades: Barge, Haemonculi, Incubi, Scourges, Ravager, Transport, Warriors, Wyches

formations.name: Kabal Syndicate
upgrades: Barge, Dracon, Haemonculi, Scourges, Ravager, Transport, Warriors, Wyches

sections.name: Black Heart Partisans
sections.description: Up to two for each Bladed Lotus Kabals taken

formations.name: Haemonculi Coven
formations.units: Two Haemonculi units and four Wracks

sections.name: Black Heart Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Black Heart Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Ancient
items.description: Add one Dark Eldar Haemonculus Ancient Character to a unit in the formation

items.name: Dracon/Succubus
items.description: Add one Dark Eldar Dracon or Dark Eldar Succubus to a unit in the formation

items.name: Haemonculi
items.description: One Haemonculi unit and one Grotesques

items.name: Ravager
items.description: One or two Dark Eldar Ravagers

items.name: Talos
items.description: Add up to four Dark Eldar Talos

items.name: Transport
items.description: Any combination of transport options may be taken to transport a formation, as long as no vehicle has an empty transport slot. Not all units in a formation require a transport vehicle. Transport options selected may only transport units from the same formation. Up to three Raiders may be added to a formation for free to carry any Incubi, Warrior, Wych, Haemonculi and/or Wrack units, additional Raiders are added for free to transport units from the Dark Eldar Upgrades section, as long as that unit can be trasported in a Raider. Any number of Raiders may be replaced by two Dark Eldar Venoms, for 25 points per Raider replaced.

items.name: Barges
items.description: Up to three Dark Eldar Barge's of Pleasure may be added to a formation. One Barge of Pleasure replaces two Raiders in the formation.
